text: without a doubt the best thing about my
job is that i get to see the world but
one of the other best things about it is
that this camera has allowed me to stay
at some of the world's top hotels and
today i want to share with you the 20
best places i have come across in all my
travels each of these places are in
different countries different price
ranges and just maybe when the world
gets back to traveling this might be
your next getaway with no particular
order except saving the best for last
let's get started the first on our list
is actually here in canada but like way
further north we're going to be starting
off with yukon pines cabin this is
officially going down in the guinness
world records as the coziest hotel room
on planet earth it is a log cabin style
room with a fireplace a heated bathroom
and everything that you need to escape
the minus 30 weather in the harshest of
conditions in the winter and the best
thing is it is in prime condition to see
the northern lights if you've ever
dreamed of seeing them let me tell you
it's 10 times better than you can
imagine and this place right here is one
of the best places to see it i would
recommend bringing a playlist of netflix
videos you want to watch and your
significant other it doesn't get any
better than that the next is cree eco
resort and this has to be one of the
most challenging to get to places but
it's because it's so hard to get there
that this place has remained a absolute
aquatic paradise if you're a scuba diver
a snorkeler or you just want to be where
nobody else is you have to get out to
raja ampat and cre eco resort gives you
some over water bungalows with no ac
just a simple fan and because there's no
restaurants on this island you are on a
food plan and it just so happens that
the food served here is fantastic but
the best part of it all is that you have
blue ass water as far as the eye can see
and the marine biodiversity it is
considered to be one of the last aquatic
paradises on planet earth enough said
now the next stop is actually in bali
which is where i live and the best thing

the karangasem region hosts one of these

wapadi ume is perfection it is exactly
what i would want one of the most
beautiful and breathtaking views you
could ever imagine overlooking rice
terraces all sorts of local people
working just like the balinese did
before tourism boomed you have volcanoes
and mountains surrounding you in this
green lush region and for me the room
the way it was designed is just the best
having our own private little plunge
pool having kind of like a 180 degree
view over the rice terraces it was
tough if not impossible to beat and it
wasn't an outrageous price if this is
ringing some bells for you this could be
a great spot for a special occasion now
we're going to increase our altitude a

feel like that should be their slogan
i'm bringing you to the anantara jabal
shams and this right here is one of the

has such a deep and meaningful

being a broke backpackers hostel and 10

we're going up now to like a 12. we're
now going into a level of luxury that i

you got to go to that steakhouse now
contrary to what you may think at this

you get the experience of being here we
